user.title: InControl2 API Client Configuration

auth.title: Authenticate InControl2
auth.description:
Please follow this [link]({authorization_url}), login and then **Allow** access to your InControl2 account. If you get an **Unauthorized** error, ensure the Redirect URI defined for the API Client matches {cb_url}

Once complete, come back here and press **Submit** below.

reauth.description:

Once complete, come back here and press **Submit** below.

error.follow_link: Please follow the link and authenticate before pressing Submit
